article_title: To End VA Doctor Shortage, Medicare Funding Needs Boost

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: As the nation grapples with the imbroglio at the Department of Veteran Affairs and a doctor shortage cited in months-long delays at VA Hospitals, policymakers are focusing on ways to boost the nation’s physician supply. The fix may lie with the Medicare health insurance program for the elderly, which currently holds [...]
